choices: your awake and late for school
1.content:
standing there looking into the still lake's surface, the twin moons shining in the reflection, reaching forward towards your alternate self in the lake,

BEEP BEEP BEEP

as your hand comes closer,

BEEP BEEP BEEP

the lake seems almost to reach back to your hand, inviting your touch,

BEEP BEEP BEEP

just before your hands touches the still surface...
1.title: WAKE UP

13.content: A large SPLASH can be heard, and you quickly back up from the lake, almost tripping backwards over a root. A strange creature, glowing fluorescent green, approaches from the rippling lake and seems to be curious about you. In a growling voice the creature asks 'Are you a male or female'? You look at it cautiously, and decide to reply with...
13.title: Splash

choices: says nothing and sinks back into the lake
132.content: Offput by the question you stare blankly at the creature for a few moments before replying. "Female." The creature looks at you intently and you can almost see the wheels turning in its head, and you are wondering, dreading what it is about to say next.
132.title: "Female."

info.brief_description: lately you've been able to control your dream, or have your dreams been controlling you
info.description:
this is a story about dreams, you can do anything you want to, i don't give a dame i only have 4 things to say.

1.FOLLOW THE PLOT, if your addition does not follow the plot of the previous author, it WILL BE DELETED, end of story.
2.try not to change the plot around too much, keep it going with the same one for a few choices.
3.always live an unmarked choice with your choices, let someone else think of something to go there
(less work fro you)
4.add something more then a few sentences, and try to add as much detail as possible

if there are any more restriction i'll add them later in life.
